TopicTitle: Where's go my Toolbar? it's disappear...

Articles.Content:
Hey, i uninstall some mod and my toolbar disapper, ok i think some break so i uninstall game and reinstall twice without mod and the same problem???

it happend with save game all from 1.0.2 ...

If i start the game and resume and old save game (version 1.0.2) toolbar disapper and if back to menu and try with new game the same toolbar disapper.

But if i star with a new game or a game save with the fresh install this new game its ok toobar is there and if i back to menu and try with old save game it's ok toolbar is there ....???

I try with fresh install twice and the same ...????

Can someone help me?

i dont wanna start again my science game ... :_(

You can see it here, at the beggining no toolbar and if i try to open alternatives toolbars them apper this semi toolbat cut in the middle ...????

Edited May 24, 2015 by Josefpm
Solve!!!

Hi Josefpm, because you are using a modded save after uninstalling addons, the modded save has references to mods which you have removed, modded saves are often incompatible with stock KSP as addons use the save file to store some information.

You will need to back up your save and edit out lines that reference addons, or reinstall those addons.

Moving to modded support.

Ohh sorry for wrong forum ... thanks for the move.

Auto answer thanks to sal_vager i star thinking and EUREKA! i found it.

The problem its this line in save games:

TechTreeUrl = GameData\ModuleManager.TechTree

I unistall maduelmanager but the save games try to find it no way its erase and for this reason toolbar disapper.

The soution its quiet simple change this line for this:

GameData/Squad/Resources/TechTree.cfg

And all back to normality.

Be carefull with mod guys.

Thanks to Sal_vager he make me think in other way and find the solution. Great man!.
